languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт несмело улыбается в ответ.{/n} "Как и я, элантах. Неизвестность... противоречивое состояние души — яркое, будоражащее, неподвластное разуму. Мне нравится это чувство, но оно же меня и пугает. Я я рада, что могу разделить это чувство с тобой, пока мы идем одной дорогой".

{n}Yrliet smiles timidly in return.{/n} "Neither do I, elantach. The unknown... A conflicted state of the soul... It is bright, exciting, illogical. I like this feeling, but it also frightens me. I am glad that I can share this feeling with you while we walk the same road."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт несмело улыбается в ответ.{/n} "Как и я, элантах. Неизвестность... противоречивое состояние души — яркое, будоражащее, неподвластное разуму. Мне нравится это чувство, но оно же меня и пугает. Я я рада, что могу разделить это чувство с тобой, пока мы идем одной дорогой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet smiles quietly in return.{/n} "As do I, elantach. The unknown... a conflicted state of the soul — bright, exciting, illogical. I like this feeling, but it also frightens me. I-I'm glad that I can share this feeling with you while we are walking down the same path."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特羞怯地一笑。{/n}“其实我也一样，外界人。未知的状态……矛盾的灵魂……是一种明亮、兴奋，但不讲逻辑的古怪状态。我喜欢这种感觉，又有些害怕它。我很高兴能与你并肩而行，共同分享这样的感觉。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet smiles timidly in return.{/n} "Neither do I, elantach. The unknown... A conflicted state of the soul... It is bright, exciting, illogical. I like this feeling, but it also frightens me. I am glad that I can share this feeling with you while we walk the same road."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特羞怯地一笑。{/n}“其实我也一样，外界人。未知的状态……矛盾的灵魂……是一种明亮、兴奋，但不讲逻辑的古怪状态。我喜欢这种感觉，又有些害怕它。我很高兴能与你并肩而行，共同分享这样的感觉。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet te devuelve una sonrisa apocada.{/n} «Yo tampoco, elantach. Lo desconocido... Tener el alma en conflicto... Es algo luminoso, excitante, ilógico. Me gusta esta sensación, pero al mismo tiempo me asusta. Me alegro de poder compartir esta sensación contigo mientras recorremos el mismo camino».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet smiles timidly in return.{/n} "Neither do I, elantach. The unknown... A conflicted state of the soul... It is bright, exciting, illogical. I like this feeling, but it also frightens me. I am glad that I can share this feeling with you while we walk the same road."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet te devuelve una sonrisa apocada.{/n} «Yo tampoco, elantach. Lo desconocido... Tener el alma en conflicto... Es algo luminoso, excitante, ilógico. Me gusta esta sensación, pero al mismo tiempo me asusta. Me alegro de poder compartir esta sensación contigo mientras recorremos el mismo camino».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet esquisse un sourire timide.{/n} « Moi non plus, elantach. L'inconnu... Un conflit de l'âme... Tout semble lumineux, palpitant, illogique. J'aime ce sentiment, mais il m'effraie aussi. Je suis heureuse de pouvoir partager mes émotions avec vous tandis que nous cheminons ensemble. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet smiles timidly in return.{/n} "Neither do I, elantach. The unknown... A conflicted state of the soul... It is bright, exciting, illogical. I like this feeling, but it also frightens me. I am glad that I can share this feeling with you while we walk the same road."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet esquisse un sourire timide.{/n} « Moi non plus, elantach. L'inconnu... Un conflit de l'âme... Tout semble lumineux, palpitant, illogique. J'aime ce sentiment, mais il m'effraie aussi. Je suis heureuse de pouvoir partager mes émotions avec vous tandis que nous cheminons ensemble. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet lächelt daraufhin schwach.{/n} "Ich auch nicht, Elantach. Das Unbekannte ... Ein Widerstreit der Seele ... Gleißend hell, aufregend, unlogisch. Das Gefühl gefällt mir, aber es macht mir auch Angst. Ich bin froh, dass ich dieses Gefühl mit Euch teilen kann, während wir dieselbe Straße beschreiten."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet smiles timidly in return.{/n} "Neither do I, elantach. The unknown... A conflicted state of the soul... It is bright, exciting, illogical. I like this feeling, but it also frightens me. I am glad that I can share this feeling with you while we walk the same road."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet lächelt daraufhin schwach.{/n} "Ich auch nicht, Elantach. Das Unbekannte ... Ein Widerstreit der Seele ... Gleißend hell, aufregend, unlogisch. Das Gefühl gefällt mir, aber es macht mir auch Angst. Ich bin froh, dass ich dieses Gefühl mit Euch teilen kann, während wir dieselbe Straße beschreiten."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはおずおずと微笑み返す。{/n}「我もだ、エランタ。未知なるもの...魂の葛藤…明るく、刺激的で、非論理的。この感覚は好きだが、怖くもある。同じ道を歩きながら、お前とこの感覚を共有できることを嬉しく思う」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet smiles timidly in return.{/n} "Neither do I, elantach. The unknown... A conflicted state of the soul... It is bright, exciting, illogical. I like this feeling, but it also frightens me. I am glad that I can share this feeling with you while we walk the same road."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはおずおずと微笑み返す。{/n}「我もだ、エランタ。未知なるもの...魂の葛藤…明るく、刺激的で、非論理的。この感覚は好きだが、怖くもある。同じ道を歩きながら、お前とこの感覚を共有できることを嬉しく思う」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, cevaben ürkekçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Ben de öyle elantach. Bilinmez... Ruhun çatışması... Parlak, heyecanlı ve mantıksız bir şeydir. Bu duyguyu seviyorum ama aynı zamanda beni korkutuyor. Aynı yolda yürüdüğümüz için duygularımı seninle paylaşabildiğime seviniyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet smiles timidly in return.{/n} "Neither do I, elantach. The unknown... A conflicted state of the soul... It is bright, exciting, illogical. I like this feeling, but it also frightens me. I am glad that I can share this feeling with you while we walk the same road."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, cevaben ürkekçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Ben de öyle elantach. Bilinmez... Ruhun çatışması... Parlak, heyecanlı ve mantıksız bir şeydir. Bu duyguyu seviyorum ama aynı zamanda beni korkutuyor. Aynı yolda yürüdüğümüz için duygularımı seninle paylaşabildiğime seviniyorum."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
